Body:
warnings.simplefilter('error', Warning)
m = UNITS.meter
v = [3, 4]
ans = [0.6, 0.8]
self.assertArrayEqual(vector_hat(v), ans)
v = Vector(3, 4)
self.assertVectorEqual(vector_hat(v), ans)
v = Vector(3, 4) * m
self.assertVectorEqual(vector_hat(v), ans)
v = [0, 0]
ans = [0, 0]
self.assertArrayEqual(vector_hat(v), ans)
v = Vector(0, 0)
self.assertVectorEqual(vector_hat(v), ans)
v = Vector(0, 0) * m
self.assertVectorEqual(vector_hat(v), ans)
